headline: Tracking Dan Loeb's Third Point Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
summary: Dan Loeb's Third Point 13F reveals portfolio shifts, new stakes, and top holdings. Portfolio value slightly increased to $7.44B. Read more on the portfolio here.
